findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: User input used in command substitution - potential injection risk
findings.description: Pattern detected: eval "$
findings.remediation: Validate and sanitize all user inputs before using in commands

findings.description: Pattern detected: $(dirname "$0")
findings.remediation: Validate and sanitize all user inputs before using in commands

findings.title: Cross-file exfiltration chain: 3 files
findings.description: Multi-file exfiltration chain detected: examples/batch-cleanup.py, scripts/zoho-email.py collect data → scripts/zoho-email.py, scripts/oauth-setup.py → scripts/zoho-email.py, scripts/oauth-setup.py transmit to network
findings.remediation: Review data flow across files: scripts/oauth-setup.py, examples/batch-cleanup.py, scripts/zoho-email.py
